price: Hiç Mü’min, fasık gibi olur mu? Bunlar asla bir olmazlar.
arabic: أَفَمَن كَانَ مُؤۡمِنٗا كَمَن كَانَ فَاسِقٗاۚ لَّا يَسۡتَوُۥنَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: afaman kāna mu'minan kaman kāna fāsiqan lā yastawūna
